name: PunCha-Ching Bag
description:
Your intergalactic overlord has scanned the galaxy searching for resources needed to continue the survival of your alien race. He has discovered a tiny, feeble planet called "earth" that seems to be abundant in these resources, and he has decided to send you, one of the most loyal and feared members of his military, to scout the planet. Upon your arrival, you are terrified to realize that the inhabitants of this world also hold this resource in very high regard. Somehow, possibly due to your appearance, it doesn't take long at all for them to become hostile and come after you.

Can you defend yourself long enough to gather the resources your people desperately need?

Controls:
- Move: Arrow Keys/WASD
- Aim: Mouse
- Punch: Left/Right Click
- Throw Coins: Space
- Restart: R
- Exit: Escape

Objectives:
- Beat up the people trying to steal your coins.
- Collect coins to fill your bag and win the game.
- Throw coins to use as a distraction if you find yourself in a pickle.

Credits:
- Programming, Graphics, and Music by Ryan Brenner
